result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angel Marie Lane

defendant.name: Lane, Angel Marie
defendant.address: 3838 North Port Washington Road, Milwaukee, WI 53212

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Angel Marie Lane not in court.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court for Angel Marie Lane.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah M Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference.
Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until the next court date. 
Court orders case adjourned for Calendar Call in Branch 30.
Calendar call scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane appeared by video.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Angel Marie Lane.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Court vacates stayed warrant. Case is adjourned in Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane not in court.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Angel Marie Lane.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for status conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Br. 30.
Calendar call scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane not in court.  Attorney Michael B Plaisted appeared by video for Angel Marie Lane.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah Dahdouh in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a scheduling conference. Defendant's appearance waived. Defense is in receipt of discovery and offer and requests time to review with client.
Case adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference on 9/08/22 at 1:30pm, Branch 30.
Court reminds the defendant all previous bail conditions remain.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane in court with attorney Michael B Plaisted.   No Assistant District Attorney Available appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered bench warrant withdrawn.  Recall issued.
  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for calendar call.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.

Attorney Michael B Plaisted in court.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a status conference.  No appearance by the defendant.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed until the next court date.  Case adjourned to Br. 30.  Calendar call scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane in court via telephone with attorney Michael B Plaisted.  Thomas L. Potter appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Angel Marie Lane appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
All parties appear via zoom.  Status Conference held.  Court adjourns matter to an in person date due to Defendant's difficulties with zoom.  
  Status conference scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Angel Marie Lane appeared by video means.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Pretrial Conference.  Defendant was unable to connect to audio.  Court messaged defendant by zoom and confirmed name and notified defendant of next court date.  Case will be in person, Courthouse Room 622.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Status conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Angel Marie Lane in court.  Alexander James Geocaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 30 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 04/26/2022 @01:30pm
